<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Butterfly Blade Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1472)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 60</row>

**Perception** +23

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Goka Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [butterfly swords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=162) (2), +1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +20 

</row>

**HP** 235

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_butterfly sword_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [Twin](/Traits.aspx?ID=197)),
**Damage** 2d4+15 slashing

**Butterfly's Kiss**   The warrior can make [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

**Mastermind's Eye**   When the warrior successfully identifies a creature using [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against their attacks until the start of its next turn; if they critically succeed, it's flat-footed against their attacks for 1 minute.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The warrior's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Studied Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  The warrior makes a telegraphed attack to learn about their foe. They make a melee Strike. On a hit, they can immediately attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about the target. On a critical hit, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check to Recall Knowledge. The target is then temporarily immune to Studied Strike for 1 day

</column>
name: Butterfly Blade Warrior
